content.description: Sit start matched on the blade-arete. From there, follow the arete all the way to its pinnacle, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A couple of pads. There is a rock directly behind the topout.
content.location: It climbs the west side of arete's north arete.

content.description: Sit start with a decent left hand edge and an almost nothing right hand. From there, gain a right hand edge, follow to a left hand edge, then the lip, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad will work fine. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the center of Sabbath's west face.

content.description:
Concerta Clan traverses a solid face over a nice landing.

Sit start with a right hand edge and a left hand edge in a shallow hueco. From there, bump your left hand over to a good, flat edge, place a heel hook, bump your right hand into the left hand start, then match hands, follow along with the heel hook, gain a good left hand around the shallow corner, reach a sloping right hand with a small edge, stick the great arete, and follow it to the boulder's apex to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: At least two pads, preferably three. There is a good landing throughout, but there is a rock directly behind the finish.
content.location: It traverses the boulder's west face.
